chunk:
100% Pure Facial Oil, Nourishing

Brand: 100% Pure

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Grapeseed Oil (Organic), Organic Black Currant Oil (High Concentration Gamma Linolenic Acid), Alpha Linolenic Acid (ALA) (ALA), Vitamin C (Ascorbyl Palmitate), Vitamin E (A Tocopherol), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil (Organic), Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract (Organic)

Directions: This intensely moisturizing facial is to be used daily to nourish and hydrate, even around eye and neck area. A great night treatment when paired with the Facial Healing Balm.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
